channel.title: TOR:RY on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TOR:RY on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: RBC Names Citigroup’s Duffield Head of Equity-Linked Origination
item.description: Royal Bank of Canada has hired long-serving Citigroup Inc. banker Rich Duffield to lead its equity-linked origination efforts.

item.title: RBC Names Citigroup’s Duffield Head of Equity-Linked Origination
item.description: Royal Bank of Canada has hired long-serving Citigroup Inc. banker Rich Duffield to lead its equity-linked origination efforts.

item.title: RBC Sounds Out Investors on Potential Canadian Dollar AT1 Sale
item.description: Royal Bank of Canada is looking at selling Additional Tier 1 notes in Canadian dollars, to help refinance AT1 debt that it can soon buy back, according to people with knowledge of the matter.

item.title: RBC Sounds Out Investors on Potential Canadian Dollar AT1 Sale
